Reviews.Content: nice clean splendid view dubai liked furniture balcony reception balcony unlocked maybe worried people falling haha cant complain nice hotel pay staff little gloomy blasé sometimes maybe day beach day lovely days thank

Reviews.Content: stayed dubai shopping festival 5 nights trip middle east dubai particular expectations entering hotel bit disappointed perfect location close airport 1015 mins cab ride bur dubai amazingly clean comfortable beds bathrooms top class lucky superior 13 floor floor balcony attached facing glorious burj khalifa distant burj al arab looks wonderful night entire dubai 13th floor unblocked view plenty amenities hotel hotel staff warm complaint day age free wifi free wifi bar reception bit signal reaching seating opp reception wonderful indian vegetarian restaurant 10 mins walk hotel definitely stay

Reviews.Title: “recommend this hotel”

Reviews.Content: stayed nights hotel stopover europe hotel located close airport 15mins taxi convenient unfortunately dubai taxi location fine ideally located liked breakfast particularly bircher muesli hotels offer son contracted rota virus found hospital day supposed fly europe hotel excellent arranged doctor call didnt respond doctors treatment night manager called ambulance told worry extended stay didnt experience lifts peak times staff reception checkin 14 hour flight slow checkout value money hotel excellent

Reviews.Title: “Great hotel !”
Reviews.Author: Barniaou
Reviews.Content: hotel dubai location walk 10 min nearest metro station thats ok 19th floor fantastic breakfast continental plenty swimming pool service staff theres pub called 3 barrels level theres football manager game web site bed confortable drinks mini fridge expensive especially alcool day following night wait flight care bag extra charge free internet wifi wasnt practical ethernet connection available

Reviews.Title: “2 small lifts for 30 floors, do not forget your staff in your room”
Reviews.Author: Ahmad_king
Reviews.Content: hello stayed majestic hotel 4 nights bit main lifts 2 lifts entire 30 floors crowded alot breakfast crowded average food selections addition forgotten 3 shirts till bags home contacted received strange answer 1 found investigation manager replied rudly stating mistake dress staff nicely recommend hotel

Reviews.Title: “Great location and service but mostly business hotel!”
Reviews.Author: Des_1982
Reviews.Content: spent week dubai hotel comfortable overlooking city dubai location excellent middle bur dubai 3 minutes walking bin al waleed metro station dinner restaurant amazing greek food 24hours restaurant nice clean breakfast served loved own custom omelet happy cooker didnt liked bar thats style bars cleanliness business center check emails fast connection wish didnt close staff friendly extremely polite except receptionists didnt speak clients checkin check talked book dessert safari means money impression perfect business hotel
